scripts.gh-pages:copy: copyfiles -u 1 'build/*' gh-pages && copyfiles -u 2 'p5.layers/build/**/*' gh-pages/p5.layers/ && copyfiles -u 2 'p5.vector-arguments/build/**/*' gh-pages/p5.vector-arguments/
scripts.gh-pages:prepare: test -d gh-pages || git worktree add gh-pages gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:push: cd gh-pages && git add -A && (git commit -m 'Deploying to gh-pages:publish' || true) && git push origin +gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:publish: run-s gh-pages:prepare gh-pages:clean build:docs gh-pages:copy gh-pages:push
